CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 24, 1961, pg. A14 reads: "Highest Award - Hazel Henderson of Washington, Pa., was the winner of the "Freda," highest award in hobby ceramics, at the annual show sponsored recently by the Pittsylvania [sic] Ceramic Guild, at the Hotel Penn-Sheraton. She won first prize in mosaics, first in glaze, and third in underglaze."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Hazel Henderson, winner of the "Freda" trophy, wearing three Pittsylvania Ceramic Guild ribbons, standing in front of table with her ceramic pieces at the Pittsylvania Ceramic Guild show, Penn-Sheraton
